title: Riot Support Useless.
body:
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} I cannt tell you how many times I've posted them, whether it be a simple ass refund of Rp to spend it on another champion, or to remove a leaver buster due to being a victim of internet problems that weren't even my fault. Let's talk about how shitty riot support is. Tell us your stories here :3. If ever something comes up, like somoene close of mine gets hacked, or worse, loses their account password completely, and doesn't know how to retreave it, I highly doubt they'd help him/her, and wouldnt refer him/her to riot support Ever. What a fail Riot support is.

One thing on the other hand they can improve is firing every single riot support employee, and recruiting better ones at that. Who tells me that they can't handle a simple refund. The fuck?

replies.body:
If you had a really shitty time contacting Support, I definitely want to do whatever I can to help fix that.   What seems to be your exact issue though?  Is it related to the refund of RP and Leaverbuster you encountered? If so, can you explain these specific issues a little further in-depth for me?  Doing so should allow me to give you a full answer as to what is going on!

Reply back and let me know!
I only had 1 bad experience with Riot support ever, mostly you guys are actually alright and answer timely. The surveys are great too, have you learned anything from them ?

HAHAHAHA notice how this garbage support responded assuming it was about taking money back from these money scoundrels bending us over after we virtually donated them their paychecks or because they can't grasp the idea of putting money into better things then ways to get more money out of us rather then making it a game that is more appealing... Just to end it with that way we can give you an answer not a solution.. they won't fix whats wrong they will just say sorry we can't do this.. I don't even play this game anymore but instead sit in blogs and write articles on these bastards.
That's a very sad life if you only enjoy writing articles that bash on a company who is way more successful then you'll probably ever be.

I hope a whole company is more successful then 1 guy. Also your life must not be that great if your bashing my comment. You never explained what you mean by successful, if you mean having money than yes more successful at that. But I know that I am more successful than all of riot at, its being honest.

You take time out of your "successful" day to trash post on a game you don't play anymore, how is that a healthy life? "I don't even play this game anymore but instead sit in blogs and write articles on these bastards" That's your version of a successful life? Taking your free time to write negative articles?

I would appreciate faster responses. I hate waiting 4 days to sometimes 2 weeks for a response.

I made a ticket in support asking for around 10 rp to get a champ or skin but didnt get a response until almost a week later and by that time a friend helped me out. 

When I first started and on a different account sent a ticket for 10-20 rp I got a response within 20 minutes...

> [{quoted}](name=Lbound,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5yHey6jh,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-20T16:25:37.628+0000)
>
> hether it be a simple ass refund of Rp to spend it on another champion, or to remove a leaver buster due to being a victim of internet problems that weren't even my fault.

If you used your refund credits, you can't get a refund and if you lost internet you still get punished for leaving, because people who just ragequit or leave on purpose will just dc their internet.

I've dealt with them a few times and they've been all very helpful and quick.
TY to: hisNameIsJickoy, SirAaru, Couch Commando and Hana. Best support I've experienced, ever. You guys are the real MVP.

>  I cannt tell you how many times I've posted them, whether it be a simple ass refund of Rp to spend it on another champion, or to remove a leaver buster due to being a victim of internet problems that weren't even my fault.
So uh... you're upset with Riot because you buy things without making sure it's something you actually want? You realize that buying things isn't the same as renting or borrowing, right? They don't have to give you refunds, yet they still give everyone a certain amount because they're nice like that. It's nobody's fault but your own if you use more than that, or that you even need it in the first place. You can't just buy shit with Riot points by accident. 
As for getting hit by LeaverBuster, saying it's not your fault? It's not Riot's fault either that your internet craps out. You've screwed the game for the four other people on your team, and the fact that you're even getting hit by a penalty for disconnected, means that you've been doing it frequently enough to get flagged by the system. If you're connection is that shaky, that's entirely on you. Not Riot. Get it fixed rather than bitching at them. 
> One thing on the other hand they can improve is firing every single riot support employee, and recruiting better ones at that. Who tells me that they can't handle a simple refund. The fuck?
Why should they handle people just because you're having issued caused by problems on your end? Seriously, you give the impression of being one of those customers that constantly yell and demand to see a manager, despite being at fault. By the sound of things, they're telling you they can't handle a refund because you've been asking for far, far too many. Stop buying shit you don't want, man. It's not a hard concept to grasp. People don't get fired just because you can't comprehend how things work. Fortunately. 

I've had to deal with Riot support a few times myself, and never have I felt like that they've been incompetent, or have had issues comprehending the problem I've had. And they've -always- provided a solution, even if they've had to bring in people from oher departments to do it. They've been polite, and provided information every step of the way. I mean hell, I've never even gotten the impression that I've been sent a copy-paste reply, and that says quite a bit in this day and age. 
The -only- thing I could mention that's been even slightly negative, is the waiting period between replies. And I don't blame them for that, I know they have a lot of things to deal with, and the matters I've brought up haven't been super pressing. Seeing this thread, and the shit you've posted? Well, suffice it to say that I now understand why they can be a bit slow, if people flood them with dumbass requests such as those.

Im i the only one that wants to know why he is buying champs with RP in the first place?  And why play a league game if you're running on a McDonalds wifi?  But {{item:3174}} {{champion:223}}  Thats none of my business
